It's not a keylogger. I've been using it for months, and not had a single problem.
For those REALLY paranoid about keyloggers, use an authenticator. Especially if your accounts been "hacked" before.
Also, If you get an email from "Blizzard", linking you to a site to verify your account, or something like that, DON'T! It's a scam, and they get your login details from there. So, your account wasn't even hacked- you just told them your username and password yourself.
